customer_name: Otters and Others Zoo and Conservation

citations.narrative:
A water tub in the pen with two pigs had large amount of brown slime on the bottom and sides of the tubs. The water was
cloudy with floating algae and debris. Contaminated water can be unpalatable and unhealthy for the animals. All water
containers must be kept clean and sanitary.
To be corrected by July 1, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n
